main event: On August 11, 1966, a military observer reported seeing a UFO in Harvard, Massachusetts. The object was visible for about 1 minute.
interesting points: The object was described as flying under the lights of a storm and appeared to be unaffected by the lighting conditions., No physical evidence or photographs were collected from the sighting., The observer had previously noted unusual aerial phenomena in the area., The object was reported as potentially being a cloud, indicating uncertainty., The military source indicates that this was a serious observation.
witness description: The observer is a military personnel with a positional knowledge from their service.
